org.gradoop.flink.algorithms.fsm.dimspan.model

Interface GraphUtils

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SearchGraphUtils
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DFSCodeUtils, GraphUtilsBase, SearchGraphUtilsBase, SortedSearchGraphUtils, UnsortedSearchGraphUtils

    public interface GraphUtils
extends Serializable
    Util methods to interpret and manipulate int-array encoded patterns and graphs

    • Field Summary

      Fields

    • Method Detail

      • multiplex

        int[] multiplex(int fromId,
                int fromLabel,
                boolean outgoing,
                int edgeLabel,
                int toId,
                int toLabel)
        Creates an integer multiplex representing a single edge traversal.
        Parameters:
        fromId - traversal from id
        fromLabel - traversal from label
        outgoing - traversal oin or against direction (0=outgoing)
        edgeLabel - label of the traversed edge
        toId - traversal to id
        toLabel - traversal to label
        Returns:
        integer multiplex representing the traversal

        boolean isLoop(int[] mux,
